H0.text: The water cycle ends by repeating itself.

H1.text: Ocean evaporation is how the water cycle ends.

H2.text: Freezing glaciers is how the water cycle ends.

H3.text: Cloud precipitation is how the water cycle ends.

A4.text: The water returns to the ocean, to continue the water cycle.

A5.text: The ocean holds 97% of the total water on the planet; 78% of global precipitation occurs over the ocean, and it is the source of 86% of global evaporation.
